Description_lang: $?s212436[Butchery][Carve] increases the damage of your next Wildfire Bomb explosion by|cFFFFFFFF ${$s1}.1%|r, stacks up to $341401u times.

description_blz.en_US: Carve increases the damage of your next Wildfire Bomb explosion by 0.0%, stacks up to 2 times.
